entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
